intro.description: Welcome to the Pattern cheat sheet. This cheat sheet will help you to build a sample application using patterns.

item.title: Select a pattern
item.description: Launch the wizard to begin. You can select a pattern to create. There are a few different patterns that you can try out, follow the steps in the cheat sheet to help guide you through building the patterns.

item.title: Customize your pattern
item.description: Now that you have chosen the pattern that you would like to create, customize your options.

item.title: Create the Java project that will contain your pattern code
item.description: Continue by creating your java project.

item.title: Create the Java classes for your pattern
item.description: Now create each of the java classes that are required for your pattern. You already specified some things about them in step 2, now customize them if you wish, or just create them.

item.title: Generate a test class for your pattern
item.description: Create a class to test your pattern.

item.title: Run the test
item.description: Select your test class, and select the run as application option in the toolbar to test it. When you are finished you can indicate that you have finished by pressing the completed button. Hope you enjoyed using this new cheat sheet!
